mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO, B.*, CZR.USERNAME ||' '|| CZR.REALNAME REC_CZR_NAME, SHR.USERNAME ||' '|| SHR.REALNAME REC_SHR_NAME, PFR.USERNAME ||' '|| PFR.REALNAME REC_PFR_NAME, ZDJSR.USERNAME ||' '|| ZDJSR.REALNAME REC_ZDJSR_NAME, WHR.USERNAME ||' '|| WHR.REALNAME WHR_REALNAME, WHDW.DPRTNAME WHDW_DRPTNAME, SHBM.DPRTNAME SHBM_DRPTNAME, PFBM.DPRTNAME PFBM_DRPTNAME, ZJH.ZJH||' '||ZJH.ZWMS NEW_ZJH, (CASE WHEN B.ZT =0 THEN '保存' WHEN B.ZT =1 THEN '提交' WHEN B.ZT =2 THEN '已审核' WHEN B.ZT =3 THEN '已批准' WHEN B.ZT =4 THEN '中止（关闭）' WHEN B.ZT =5 THEN '审核驳回' WHEN B.ZT =6 THEN '批准驳回' WHEN B.ZT =8 THEN '作废' WHEN B.ZT =9 THEN '关闭' WHEN B.ZT =10 THEN '完成' END) NEW_ZT,
(CASE WHEN B.is_cfzxsx=0 THEN '否' WHEN B.is_cfzxsx=1 THEN '是' END) NEW_IS_CFZXSX, (CASE WHEN B.is_zlphyx=0 THEN '否' WHEN B.is_zlphyx=1 THEN '是' END) NEW_IS_ZLPHYX, (CASE WHEN B.is_yxfjdqfzsj=0 THEN '否' WHEN B.is_yxfjdqfzsj=1 THEN '是' END) NEW_IS_YXFJDQFZSJ, (CASE WHEN B.is_yxcbw=0 THEN '否' WHEN B.is_yxcbw=1 THEN '是' END) NEW_IS_YXCBW, (CASE WHEN B.is_sp=0 THEN '否' WHEN B.is_sp=1 THEN '是' END) NEW_IS_SP, (CASE WHEN B.is_xytsqc=0 THEN '否' WHEN B.is_xytsqc=1 THEN '是' END) NEW_IS_XYTSQC, (CASE WHEN B.is_xytsgjsb=0 THEN '否' WHEN B.is_xytsgjsb=1 THEN '是' END) NEW_IS_XYTSGJSB, (CASE WHEN B.is_xybfqcbhtzd=0 THEN '否' WHEN B.is_xybfqcbhtzd=1 THEN '是' END) NEW_IS_XYBFQCBHTZD, (CASE WHEN B.eolx=1 THEN '改装' WHEN B.eolx=2 THEN '检查' WHEN B.eolx=3 THEN '修理/偏离' WHEN B.eolx=12 THEN '改装,检查' WHEN B.eolx=13 THEN '改装,修理/偏离' WHEN B.eolx=23 THEN '检查,修理/偏离' WHEN B.eolx=123 THEN '改装,检查,修理/偏离' END) NEW_EOLX,
'工程指令编号:'||B.gczlbh || ' ' || (CASE WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 0 THEN '创建' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 1 THEN '提交' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 2 THEN '已审核' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 3 THEN '已批准' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 4 THEN '中止（关闭）' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 5 THEN '审核驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 6 THEN '批准驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 8 THEN '作废' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 9 THEN '指定结束'
WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 10 THEN '完成' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 11 THEN '撤销' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 12 THEN '修改' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 13 THEN '改版' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 14 THEN '已生效' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 15 THEN '提交生产确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 16 THEN '借出确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 17 THEN '归还' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 18 THEN '导入' END) REC_HD, (CASE WHEN B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN 'CURRENT' ELSE 'LAST' END) DATA_VERSION
FROM b_g_009_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.rec_czrid
LEFT JOIN T_USER SHR ON SHR.ID = B.shrid
LEFT JOIN T_USER PFR ON PFR.ID = B.pfrid
LEFT JOIN T_USER ZDJSR ON ZDJSR.ID = B.zdjsrid
LEFT JOIN T_USER CZR ON CZR.ID = B.REC_CZRID
LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT WHDW ON WHDW.ID = B.zddwid
LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT SHBM ON SHBM.ID = B.shbmid
LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT PFBM ON PFBM.ID = B.pfbmid
LEFT JOIN D_005 ZJH ON ZJH.ZJH = B.ZJH AND ZJH.DPRTCODE=B.DPRTCODE
WHERE B.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (select rec_czsj from b_G_009_REC where REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) >= b.rec_czsj
) WHERE 2 >=RNO

SELECT B.*, CZR.USERNAME ||' '|| CZR.REALNAME REC_CZR_NAME, WHR.USERNAME ||' '|| WHR.REALNAME REC_WHR_NAME, D_ZXFL.MC NEW_ZXFL, WHDW.DPRTNAME REC_WHDW_NAME, 'CURRENT' DATA_VERSION , (CASE WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 1 THEN '新增' WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 2 THEN '修改' WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 3 THEN '删除' END) REC_XGLX_TEXT ,
(CASE WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 0 THEN '创建' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 1 THEN '提交' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 2 THEN '已审核' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 3 THEN '已批准' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 4 THEN '中止（关闭）' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 5 THEN '审核驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 6 THEN '批准驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 8 THEN '作废' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 9 THEN '指定结束'
WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 10 THEN '完成' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 11 THEN '撤销' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 12 THEN '修改' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 13 THEN '改版' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 14 THEN '已生效' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 15 THEN '提交生产确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 16 THEN '借出确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 17 THEN '归还' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 18 THEN '导入' END) REC_HD FROM B_G_00901_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER CZR ON CZR.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.WHRID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT WHDW ON WHDW.ID = B.WHDWID LEFT JOIN D_00101 D_ZXFL ON D_ZXFL.SZ = B.ZXFL WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL
SELECT B.*, CZR.USERNAME ||' '|| CZR.REALNAME REC_CZR_NAME, WHR.USERNAME ||' '|| WHR.REALNAME REC_WHR_NAME, D_ZXFL.MC NEW_ZXFL, WHDW.DPRTNAME REC_WHDW_NAME, 'LAST' DATA_VERSION , (CASE WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 1 THEN '新增' WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 2 THEN '修改' WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 3 THEN '删除' END) REC_XGLX_TEXT , (CASE WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 0 THEN '创建' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 1 THEN '提交' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 2 THEN '已审核' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 3 THEN '已批准' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 4 THEN '中止（关闭）' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 5 THEN '审核驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 6 THEN '批准驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 8 THEN '作废' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 9 THEN '指定结束'
WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 10 THEN '完成' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 11 THEN '撤销' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 12 THEN '修改' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 13 THEN '改版' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 14 THEN '已生效' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 15 THEN '提交生产确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 16 THEN '借出确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 17 THEN '归还' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 18 THEN '导入' END) REC_HD FROM B_G_00901_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER CZR ON CZR.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.WHRID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT WHDW ON WHDW.ID = B.WHDWID LEFT JOIN D_00101 D_ZXFL ON D_ZXFL.SZ = B.ZXFL WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZSJ IN (SELECT REC_CZSJ FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO, D.REC_CZSJ FROM B_G_00901_REC D WHERE D.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (SELECT T.REC_CZSJ FROM B_G_009_REC T WHERE T.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) > D.REC_CZSJ
GROUP BY D.REC_CZSJ)
WHERE 1 = RNO)
